name: Financial Consulting
short_description:
www.SmallCapStockPlays.com is a financial and investor relations website committed to 
covering the micro cap market space primarily focusing on Pink Sheets and OTC Bulletin
 Board and other sub-$5 stocks. We publish our Daily Market Movers Digest and Stocks to
 Watch newsletters which highlight some of the most active microcap stocks each market day,
 and we publish stock news articles throughout each market day highlighting the most 
active and promising stocks in the market for investors that day.
summary: Is a financial and investor relations website
